title: simple, powerful
comment: This app works in a simple & powerful way. It modifies the hosts file to redirect all DNS of known ad servers, to localhost. This is simple and gets the job done, but know that this redirects ALL name resolution so it will affect not just the web browser, but all network activity even command-line pings. It becomes simply impossible for the device to connect to any DNS name on the blacklist.   WARNING: this app will stomp on your hosts file. You will LOSE DATA if you have customized this file.

title: Had difficulty installing on Samsung Dart
comment: Very nice app, but I had trouble with the hosts file on my Samsung Dart.  The generated hosts file was too large to fit on my ROM in /system/etc, so I selected /data/data as its location.  The hosts file was then created ok, but AdAway couldn't create the simlink for me.  I had to do it manually with a terminal emulator as follows: $ su # busybox mount -o remount,rw /system # cd /system/etc # mv hosts /data/data # ln -s /data/data/hosts hosts # busybox mount -o remount,ro /system I needed busybox because the stock mount command didn't support the remount option.
